title: MD
biography: Rohit Jivanlal Parikh is an Indian-American mathematician, logician, and philosopher who has worked in many areas in traditional logic, including recursion theory and proof theory. He is a Distinguished Professor at Brooklyn College at the City University of New York (CUNY).
aiSummary: Samir Parikh is a psychiatry specialist with an H-index of 59 at Fortis (Member). Has been published in Nature Medicine, Nature, Nature Reviews Nephrology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
